firewall: Lim cov tsheb khiav hauv lub network raws li cov cai
kab mob vais lav: Malicious software tsim los replicate thiab kis
malware: Lub ntsiab lus dav dav suav nrog cov kab mob, worms, Trojans, thiab lwm yam.
phishing: Kev dag emails sim ntxias cov neeg siv los muab cov ntaub ntawv
ransomware: Malware uas encrypts cov ntaub ntawv, thov them nyiaj rau decryption
encryption: Tus txheej txheem ntawm scrambling cov ntaub ntawv kom nws unreadable yam tsis muaj tus yuam sij
decryption: Cov txheej txheem ntawm unscrambling encrypted cov ntaub ntawv rov qab mus rau daim ntawv nyeem tau
yooj yim: Ib qho tsis muaj zog hauv software lossis qhov system uas tuaj yeem siv tau
siv: Code los yog txheej txheem siv kom zoo dua ntawm qhov tsis zoo
ua txhaum cov ntaub ntawv: Tsis tso cai nkag los yog tso tawm cov ntaub ntawv rhiab heev
tus password: Ib txoj hlua zais cia ntawm cov cim siv rau kev lees paub
ob yam authentication: Yuav tsum muaj ib daim ntawv pov thawj ntxiv tshaj li tus password
social engineering: Manipulating tib neeg los muab cov ntaub ntawv tsis pub lwm tus paub
kev xeem nkag: Tso cai simulated tawm tsam kom pom qhov tsis muaj zog hauv qhov system
xoom hnub nres: Siv qhov tsis zoo uas tus neeg muag khoom software tsis paub txog
botnet: Lub network ntawm cov khoos phis tawj kis tau los ntawm tus neeg tawm tsam
tsis kam lees kev pabcuam nres: Dej nyab ib qho system nrog kev khiav tsheb kom nws tsis muaj
tswj kev nkag: Tswj leej twg los yog dab tsi muaj kev tso cai rau cov peev txheej
intrusion detection system: Saib xyuas lub network lossis cov tshuab rau kev ua haujlwm tsis raug cai
xwm txheej teb: Cov txheej txheem ua raws li thaum muaj kev ruaj ntseg tshwm sim
kev soj ntsuam kev pheej hmoo: Txheeb xyuas thiab ntsuas cov kev hem thawj thiab qhov tsis zoo
thaj tswj: Cov txheej txheem ntawm kev thov hloov tshiab los kho qhov tsis zoo
thaub qab: Tsim ib daim qauv ntawm cov ntaub ntawv los tiv thaiv kev poob
kev puas tsuaj rov qab los: Npaj kom rov ua haujlwm thiab kev ua haujlwm tom qab muaj kev cuam tshuam
digital forensics: Kev tshawb nrhiav thiab tshuaj xyuas cov pov thawj digital
